mapper.select: SELECT board_comment_no as boardCommentNo, board_no as boardNo, board_comment_content as boardCommentContent, board_comment_user as boardCommentUser FROM board_comment WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_comment( board_no, board_comment_content, board_comment_user, board_comment_pw ) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{boardCommentContent}, #{boardCommentUser}, #{boardCommentPw} )
